title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 21 April 2017 - XWiki
content:
<tillo> has joined #xwiki  
00:37 <tillo\_> has joined #xwiki  
14:11 <xwikibot> has joined #xwiki  
14:42 <VincentMassol[m]> has joined #xwiki  
14:45 <pbondoerffer[m]> has joined #xwiki  
14:45 <VincentMassol[m]> hi pbondoerffer welcome to the xwiki irc chat :)  
14:45 <pbondoerffer[m]> good morning!  
14:47 <floflobel> hi, it's possible to bind two groups on single user with LDAP ?  
15:48 <msmeria> has quit  
15:49 <msmeria> has joined #xwiki  
16:19 <msmeria> has quit  
16:53 <Pbas> has quit  
17:36 <KermitTheFragger> has quit  
18:29 <VincentMassol[m]> hmmm  
18:30 <VincentMassol[m]> am I the only one to have problems building xwiki-commons-core/xwiki-commons-extension/xwiki-commons-extension-repositories/xwiki-commons-extension-repository-maven ?  
18:30 <VincentMassol[m]> I get a java heap space issue just for this module  
18:30 <VincentMassol[m]> in the console I also see:  
18:30 <VincentMassol[m]> [WARNING] Corrupted stdin stream in forked JVM 1. See the dump file /Users/vmassol/dev/xwiki/xwiki-commons/xwiki-commons-core/xwiki-commons-extension/xwiki-commons-extension-repositories/xwiki-commons-extension-repository-maven/target/surefire-reports/2017-04-21T18-28-52\_121-jvmRun1.dumpstream  
18:30 <VincentMassol[m]> could someone else try?  
18:31 <VincentMassol[m]> ah that could be caused by the new surefire plugin maybe, but I did run commons fully before committing it, will remove to verify  
18:33 <VincentMassol[m]> yes seems to be the issue, will revert  
18:37 <mflorea> has quit  
18:38 <VincentMassol[m]> added explanations in https://jira.xwiki.org/browse/XCOMMONS-1190  
18:42 <evalica> has quit  
18:48 <sgc072> has joined #xwiki  
19:05 <sgc072> has quit  
19:08 <floflobel> has quit  
19:30 <woshilapin> has joined #xwiki  
19:41 <ClemensR> has joined #xwiki  
20:54 <Slashman> has quit  
21:00 <Aranjedeath> has joined #xwiki  
22:47 <ClemensR> has quit  
23:01 <Aranjedeath> has quit
